about_the_game:
About the demo version:

Free Demo of Andrew's Nightmare is here!

  • In the free demo, you'll have the chance to play the very first chapter of the game, where you'll explore Andy's house and witness the early stages of his "DOWNFALL".

Please note that some features and content are locked in the demo and will be available only in the full game.



"This game contains adult language and scenes of explicit violence, as well as flashing lights."

Argument:

Play as Andy, a young man who is grappling with the inner demons of his dark past.

As you explore the depths of his mind, you will confront the deceptions and illusions that threaten to devour him. Solve puzzles and unravel the secrets of the shadows of his consciousness. Can you distinguish reality from fiction before it's too late for Andy?

This game delivers a thought-provoking experience that will make you question the nature of sanity and perception.

content_descriptors.notes: This game encourages reflection on themes related to bullying and medication abuse, while also featuring imagery depicting blood, death, and violence that may be disturbing to some individuals.
